remarks: The concatenation of a word with two singleton words equals the concatenation of the word with the doubleton consisting of the symbols of the two singletons.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro/AV, 21-Oct-2018.)
statement: ccatw2s1ccatws2 $p |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ X e. V /\ Y e. V ) -> ( ( W ++ <" X "> ) ++ <" Y "> ) = ( W ++ <" X Y "> ) ) $.
